TopicTitle: Be able to play offline (Play without internet access.)

Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is in the wrong place. I do not think it is a bug.

Sometimes the internet fails. I go to launch KSP and the Launcher always says "Checking for updates".

There is no way to launch KSP when the Play button is gone. No way to cancel the check either.

I think it will be a good idea if the Launcher update check can be cancelled. And/Or have a Play Offline button.

It is good that we can disable the check for updates to the game. But the Launcher needs an option like that too.

The game is single player as far as I can tell. Should not need internet access in order to launch it.

Please add this feature and Thank You for reading.

Shortened Version: Please add a Play Offline button and/or a Cancel (Update Check) button to the KSP Launcher. Thank You.

Without this feature; I can not play the game without internet access.
open ksp.exe instead

The actual internet timeout for attempting TCP connections tends to default to 2 minutes. Back in the day with very slow connections this made more sense. Now it's just silly, but a lot of the same rules are still used deep in the network stack of operating systems.
